text.config.moderate-loading-screen.opti: Determines the background color of the loading screen
Determines the opacity of the Mojang icon from 0 to 1
Determines the opacity of the loading bar from 0 to 1
If true, summons the holy tater
If true, every mod only falls down the screen once

Hides mods marked as with the "Library" badge.
Note: not all library mods mark themselves as such, use the blacklist to hide ones that dont.

Use bash pattern matching to hide certain mods by id.
Default configuration excludes the ten million submods of Fabric Api.

Defines the behavior of falling icons.
SNOWFLAKES: Icons fall down the screen like snowflakes (default)
STACKING: Icons stack neatly into a grid, filling up the screen

Time it takes for the screen to fill up in seconds.
For best results, set this to the average time it takes for your game to load.
